local_intent: Lower until surface contact is detected at the cloth edge and verify contact; retry once if not detected.
assumptions: Cloth is localizable or can be found via raster scan
Workspace is clear for a 0.03 m descent
Contact at ~10 force units is detectable
coherence_with_global: Matches global sequence: perceive (visibility or scan), move above cloth, set yaw 90, align to cloth_edge, open gripper, then lower until contact (slow, 0.03, 10, 800) and verify with ContactDetected; retry once for robustness.
